celestial

Class Planet

  • java.lang.Object
    • celestial.Celestial
      • celestial.Planet

  • public class Planet
extends Celestial
    An object of a Planet class inherits from Celestial. Three additional members, distanceToSun, periodInMS, angleToSun.
